shortdesc.ph: Occurs each time the SDK receives a video frame and prompts you whether or not to mirror the captured video.

section.p: If the video data you want to obtain has been rotated according to the rotation information rotation in, you need to register the callback when calling the method. After you successfully register the video frame observer, the SDK triggers this callback each time it receives a video frame. You need to set whether or not to rotate the video frame in the return value of this callback.
section.note: @note This callback applies to RGBA video data only.

section.title: Returns
